Title: My Beautiful Laundrette
Overview: A Pakistani Briton renovates a rundown laundrette with his male lover while dealing with drama within his family, the local Pakistani community, and a persistent mob of skinheads.
Tagline: A Sharp, Sophisticated, Funny, Sexy, Compassionate Picture
production_companies: Channel Four Films, Working Title Films, SAF Productions
Cast: Gordon Warnecke, Daniel Day-Lewis, Roshan Seth
